meanings.definition: Resembling a hoof in shape or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The hooflike rock jutted out of the ground.
meanings.sent2: The horse had hooflike marks on the muddy trail.
meanings.sent3: The hooflike print in the sand looked like a tiny hoof dance.
meanings.sent4: The shadow cast by the tree had a hooflike silhouette on the grass.
meanings.sent5: The hooflike cloud in the sky resembled a giant hoof floating above us.
